description: This course examines the psychological and social factors related to physical health. This course provides students with an introduction to the field of health psychology which is a growing subarea of psychology. Health psychology is concerned with the relationship between psychological and social factors and physical health. At the end of this course students will be familiar with the relationship of psychological and social factors in physical health and will be able to intelligently discuss the relationship of mind and body from a scientific point of view.
title: Health Psychology
